humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report provides the size of the largest tumor as 1.2 x 1.1 x 0.9 cm. According to the rules provided, T1 tumors are 2 cm or less in size. The largest tumor size in this report is 1.2 cm, which falls under the T1 category. Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the size of the tumor is 1.2 x 1.1 x 0.9 cm, which falls within the T1 category for breast cancer staging. T1 tumors are those that measure 2 cm or less in size. The report also mentions that there is no angiolymphatic invasion and the surgical margins are negative for tumor, which further supports the T1 staging.
